name: Bubbles Deep
description:
Submition to Mini Jam 84: Bubbles - GameJam

You play as Mr. Bubble, a small air bubble, who doesnt want to be like the rest of his kind. All airbubbles always want to go up - to the light - he wants to explore the deep secrets of the ocean. 

Follow Mr. Bubble on his journey to the unknown while he fights against evil fishs that want to stop him from going further. 

Features:

3 unique enemies: 

  • Pufferfish
  • Piranha
  • Jellyfish

Shooting mechanic: 

  • You are your own ammo: You have a limited amount of oxygen to fight of enemies so be carefull 

Bossfight:

  • Every now and then a big shark arrives and tries to kill you. Fight him for huge rewards.
